meanings.definition: A person who cooperates with others.
meanings.sent1: The cooperator helped his friends with their project.
meanings.sent2: The cooperator joined the team to achieve a shared goal.
meanings.sent3: The cooperator and his pals teamed up to solve the puzzle together.
meanings.sent4: She was a true cooperator, always lending a hand when needed.
meanings.sent5: The cooperator's willingness to collaborate made the task easier for everyone.

meanings.definition: One who works jointly with others for a common purpose.
meanings.sent1: As a cooperator, he contributed his ideas to the group discussion.
meanings.sent2: The success of the project relied on each cooperator playing their part.
meanings.sent3: The cooperator and his buddies united forces to build the treehouse.
meanings.sent4: She proved to be a reliable cooperator in every team endeavor.
meanings.sent5: The cooperator's dedication to the cause inspired others to do their best.
